fields.name: Elastic Thread
fields.description: Stretchy elastic thread used for making simple bracelets that fit comfortably.

fields.name: Beading String
fields.description: Smooth beading string for necklaces and bracelets where elastic is not required.

fields.name: Clasps
fields.description: Simple clasps for fastening necklaces and bracelets securely.

fields.name: Jump Rings
fields.description: Small metal rings used to connect charms and clasps to jewellery pieces.

fields.name: Charms
fields.description: Decorative charms that can be added to bracelets and necklaces for extra style.

fields.name: Beading Needle
fields.description: A thin needle to help thread small beads easily and neatly.
